concept.title: Getting Started
concept.shortdesc: Get Couchbase Server up and running quickly and learn how to run queries by reading the Getting Started guide.

conbody.p: The topics in this guide show you how to:

ul.li: Install and set up Couchbase Server quickly (for nonproduction purposes only)
Run N1QL queries by using the command-line query tool, cbq
Run a sample web application that retrieves data from Couchbase Server
